&dhpackage; Displays an aquarium in ASCII art.
&dhpackage;
DESCRIPTION
This manual page documents briefly the &dhpackage; command.
This manual page was written for the Debian distribution because the original program does not have a manual page.
&dhpackage; is a program that displays an aquarium in ASCII art on a terminal.
USAGE
While running:
q
quit
r
redraw (will recreate all entities)
p
toggle pause
